21.ara-name: كتاب السير عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas: That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "There is no 'Adwa and no Tiyarah, and I like Fa'l." They said: "O Messenger of Allah! What is Fa'l?" He said: "A good statement." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الطِّيَرَةِ وَالْفَأْلِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About At-Tiyarah (Bad Omens)
